title: Webpack Task Configuration
description: Defines parameters for the webpack bundler

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

config.title: WebPack configuration object.
config.description: If a path is specified by `configPath,` and it is valid, this option is ignored.

configPath.title: Path to a webpack config
configPath.description: A path to a config takes precedence over the `config` option.

suppressWarnings.title: Warnings To Suppress
suppressWarnings.description: If a warning matches any of these, it will not be logged.
